title: Disable Contacts sync does not work
content:
I already described my problem in GREAT DETAIL here:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/39844583?hl=en

It was never solved and then arbitrarily closed with the message "This question is locked and replying has been disabled"

My issue was - and still is - the fact that disabling Google COntacts sync simply does not work on the Pixel 4.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
